name: calendarmap
description: Convert CSV events to ICS calendar format in 30 seconds

scripts.build: cd packages/engine && npm install && npm run build && cd ../../apps/web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:cf: cd packages/engine && npm install && npm run build && cd ../../apps/web && npm install && npm run build:cf
scripts.lint: cd packages/engine && npm run lint && cd ../../apps/web && npm run lint
